name: LD 46
description:
Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to walk character left and right.

Use SPACE or UP arrow for jump.

Fire = transition on the next scene

Game created for Ludumdare 46
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/keep-it-alive-5

It's first my game with using Godot engine.
And my first opinion - I like it!
Also it's my first game in last 4 years.
